item.title: Conservatives hoot as leftists launch Disney boycott for yanking Jimmy Kimmel
item.description: After years of aggravating the right with its woke content and policies, Disney has now officially enraged the left.

item.title: Children's gaming site Roblox under scrutiny over disturbing Kirk 'assassination simulator'
item.description: Shortly after the brutal murder of conservative star Charlie Kirk, an "assassination simulator" appeared on the children's online gaming site Roblox.
